events.title: Summer Family Festival
events.description: Join us for a day filled with live music, food trucks, face painting, and family-friendly activities in the heart of downtown.

events.title: Kids Movie Night Under Stars
events.description: Bring your blankets and enjoy a classic family movie under the stars. Popcorn and refreshments available.

events.title: Science Discovery Day
events.description: Interactive science experiments, planetarium shows, and hands-on learning experiences for curious minds.

events.title: Art & Craft Fair
events.description: Local artisans showcase their work with interactive workshops for children and families.

activities.title: Swimming Lessons
activities.description: Professional swimming instruction for beginners to advanced swimmers. Small class sizes and certified instructors.

activities.title: Kids Yoga Classes
activities.description: Fun and engaging yoga sessions designed specifically for children. Improves flexibility, focus, and mindfulness.

activities.title: STEM Robotics Club
activities.description: Build and program robots while learning coding, engineering, and problem-solving skills.

activities.title: Dance Classes for Kids
activities.description: Learn various dance styles including hip-hop, ballet, and contemporary. Great for building confidence and coordination.

venues.title: Adventure Playground
venues.description: Large outdoor playground with climbing structures, slides, swings, and a splash pad. Perfect for active families.

venues.title: Children's Library
venues.description: Extensive collection of children's books, storytelling sessions, and quiet reading areas. Free wifi and computers available.

venues.title: Indoor Trampoline Park
venues.description: Safe, supervised indoor trampoline facilities with foam pits, dodgeball courts, and special toddler areas.

venues.title: Family Bowling Center
venues.description: Modern bowling facility with bumper lanes for kids, arcade games, and party packages. Snack bar on-site.

venues.title: Nature Discovery Center
venues.description: Interactive exhibits about local wildlife, nature trails, and educational programs. Perfect for outdoor learning.
